mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email(mid, sender_email, receiver_email, send_time, subject, body, `read`, deleted, tag, send, annex_url, summary, size) VALUES (#{mid}, #{senderEmail}, #{receiverEmail}, #{sendTime}, #{subject}, #{body}, #{read}, #{deleted}, #{tag}, #{send}, #{annexUrl}, #{summary}, #{size})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM email WHERE receiver_email = #{username} and deleted != 1 and sender_email NOT IN ( SELECT username FROM user WHERE forbidden = true )
